name: Fuel Scavenger
description:
AWSD to move, Space to Jump

Your objective is to carry fuel cylinders to your spaceship. You can only carry one fuel cylinder at a time. Green dots on the minimap are the fuel cylinders.

Known bug : Some fuel cylinders may spawn through the mesh, please ignore that and find another one, I've set it to spawn more than needed.

Made for AoE Game Jam 2021 (48hrs)

Please do forgive the lack of audio and well.. everything else since I'm not proficient enough to finish with so little time.
